search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Loops (loops.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Loops can be found at https://www.loops.so/pricing .

extracted_content.content:
Pricing
-------

One price, all the things
-------------------------

Send product, marketing, and transactional emails with

flawless deliverability and a design-first approach.

Calculate your pricing
----------------------

100 subscribers

Your plan
---------

### Free

Our free allows up to 4,000 sends a month, enough to email your audience every week. All features are included. A small "Powered by Loops" footer will be attached.

[Get started](https://app.loops.so/register)

FAQ
---

You may be wondering
--------------------

Wait, what's your price again?

How is a subscriber defined?

What does the free plan include?

Do you charge for team seats?

Do you charge for email sends?

How are you different from X, Y, Z competitors?

*   ![Image 1](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Q3084HvXbqZtF20SzAKYboh4tM.png?lossless=1)
    
*   ![Image 2](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ijRL9ZNtygmgpNWzanyuTFqNPg.png?lossless=1)
    
*   ![Image 3](https://framerusercontent.com/images/r74yKYRhCtU9J991UIhWt9Bypq0.png?lossless=1)
    
*   ![Image 4](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FRIgKpboLUO3oNAfAEKhLZVypw.png?lossless=1)
    
*   ![Image 5](https://framerusercontent.com/images/0RdfvF027Gk8qKUQGa8e0XFOjg.png?lossless=1)
    
*   ![Image 6](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Xgvqvu5q6bKGH90mQSH9UhNg.svg?lossless=1)
    
*   ![Image 7](https://framerusercontent.com/images/5GbgfGBfycwaxT2CnQy6CDBjZI.png?lossless=1)
    
*   ![Image 8](https://framerusercontent.com/images/sHSCG6nrSQ4qo0O88qog3UXMo.png?lossless=1)
    
*   ![Image 9](https://framerusercontent.com/images/gb6vp25RcQ07xUY0YOkFeLKxzFY.svg?lossless=1)
    
*   ![Image 10](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Tm0M1VtsdmRS5A5J2lR56Lk6yA.svg?lossless=1)
    

Ready to get started?

Import your contacts,

get started in seconds.

Loops is the modern email platform for SaaS. Create and send marketing email, product email and transactional email in just a few minutes.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: The free tier includes all features with a limit of 4,000 sends per month and a 'Powered by Loops' footer.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Allows up to 4,000 sends a month with all features included. A 'Powered by Loops' footer is attached.
